channel.title: whimsical on Cortically Magnified
channel.description: Recent content in whimsical on Cortically Magnified

item.title: So, I designed a clock face
item.description: I got the idea from a photo of a clock that I found randomly on eBay. I thought that it was a novelty clock with a very unusual industrial design, but after a little while, I realized that what happened was that the seller took the hands part, and placed them haphazardly on the clock face. But it got me thinking, clock hands don’t have to rotate around the center, if they are mounted on rotating discs.
